issue.title: [Go][Parquet] pqarrow decimal Test fails on s390x
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15467](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15467). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Faulty random decimal generation on BigEndian causing tests to fail.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15467?focusedCommentId=17483117) by Yibo Cai (yibocai):*
Issue resolved by pull request 12272
